page.title: 03WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content: BWLCH Y CIBAU W.I. THE W.I. HAS A MEMBERSHIP OF ABOUT 20 FROM A WIDE AREA AROUND THE VILLAGE. THERE ARE 9 MEETINGS A YEAR IN THE OLD SCHOOL WITH TALKS ON CRAFTS, COOKERY, GENERAL TOPICS. THE TALKS DURING 1985 WERE ON WELL WOMANS CLINIC, WELSH MUSICAL EVENING, SEWING MACHINES, SHEEP SKIN CURING, PENNANT MELANGELL, SAHARA EXPEDITION, COOKERY DEMONSTRATION,ANNUAL MEETING, A BRAINS TRUST AND AN A.G.M. THE ANNUAL DINNER WAS AT THE VYRNWY HOTEL, THE OUTING TO THE DINORWIC POWER STATION AND CAERNARFON.
